content: amigurumi star trek captain kirk pattern presented by mandy lam @handmade crochi materials 8/4 cotton yarn purchased at black nude light brown and yellow color hobbii com yarn 2 0 and 2 75 mm crochet hook 5 mm safety eyes sewing needle scissors stitch marker embroidery thread golden yellow color pink blush make-up tag me on fb mandy lam or on instagram @handmade crochi of your creation i would love to see your spock =========================================================================== abbreviations r= row rounds single_crochet= single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet increase= increase decrease=decrease slip_stitch= slip_stitch magic_ring=magic_ring chain=chain fo= fasten_off blo= back loop only s= strands arms make 2 r1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet nude r2 single_crochet increase x3 9 r3 9 single_crochet 9 change to yellow r4 slip_stitch x9 9 r5 9 single_crochet on slip_stitch from r4 this gives a nice finish to the sleeves r6-12 9 single_crochet fo legs make 2 r1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet black r2 single_crochet increase x3 9 r3 9 single_crochet 9 r4 2sc increase x3 12 r5-7 12 single_crochet 12 fo for first leg do not fasten for the second leg stuff legs body r8 connect the two legs 2 chain 12 single_crochet first leg 2 single_crochet on chain 12 single_crochet second leg 28 r9 6 single_crochet increase 13 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet 30 r10 7 single_crochet increase 14 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet 32 r11 32sc 32 change to yellow r12 blo 32 single_crochet 32 r13-14 32 single_crochet 32 r15 6 single_crochet decrease x4 28 r16 28 single_crochet 28 r17 5sc decrease x4 24 r18 4sc decrease x4 20 r19 join arms 8sc 9 single_crochet arm #1 10 single_crochet 9 single_crochet arm#2 2 single_crochet 38 r20 17 single_crochet decrease x2 36 r21 4 single_crochet decrease x6 30 r22 3 single_crochet decrease x6 24 stuff body r23 2sc decrease x6 18 change to black r24 blo 4 single_crochet decrease x3 15 change to nude r25 blo 15 single_crochet 15 head continue from body r26 2 single_crochet increase x5 20 r27 increase x 20 40 r28 4 single_crochet increase x8 48 r29-39 48 single_crochet 48 eyes around r34-35 9 stitches apart r40 4 single_crochet decrease x8 40 r41 3 single_crochet decrease x8 32 r42 2 single_crochet decrease x8 24 stuff head r43 single_crochet decrease x8 16 r44 decrease x8 8 fo sew in the end ears make 2 magic_ring 5 single_crochet fo leave long tail for sewing hair wig r1 magic_ring 8 single_crochet light brown r2 increase x 8 16 r3 single_crochet increase x8 24 r4 2 single_crochet increase x8 32 r5 3 single_crochet increase x8 40 r6 4 single_crochet increase x8 48 change to 2 75 mm hook crochet loosely start of making strands strands s 1 slip_stitch chain 7 6 half_double_crochet slip_stitch this strand starts right before the left ear s2-3 slip_stitch ch7 6 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s4-6 slip_stitch chain 6 5 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s7 slip_stitch chain 11 10 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s8-9 slip_stitch chain 6 5 half_double_crochet slip_stitch s10 slip_stitch chain 7 6 half_double_crochet slip_stitch start to work in row r7 27 single_crochet chain 1
